Summary: On way to work, very foggy morning, on 275 west, saw 3 red lights in a triangle
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on way to work, was around 6 05 in am, very foggy morning, im heading west on 275, when I past fairfield exit with kind of goes up hill then you start to go down hill and have a good view of land shape and horizon, I saw 3 bright red lights hovering in the sky , I watched it until I past the mount healthy exit, I really didn't think any thing of it, thought it was cell phone towers, but when I went to work this morn,, No Lights of any kind in that area,, object was huge,,, seemed like it knew that it was a very foggy morning,, very wierd,, thank you,
trends: There have been no other sightings in Fairfield
This sighting has never been favorited.
